General¶

ping¶

Check the bot is online, and calculate its response time.

`{prefix}ping` - Calculate and display the bot's response time

help¶

Show this message.

`{prefix}help` - General help message

{prefix}help help - Help about the help command {prefix}help General - Help about the General category nick ++++ Allows a member to change their nickname.

invite¶

Display the bot’s invite link. The generated link gives all permissions the bot requires. If permissions are removed, some commands will be unusable.

configprefix¶

Update a servers dynamic prefix
